title: Font with unusual A
content:
Would love to know what this font is.  
Any help would be appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130526034743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mak_4640.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130526034743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mac2_4106.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [mak.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130526034743/http:/typophile.com/files/mak.png) | 26.07 KB |
author: Fiona_hud

comments.content: Probably a custom drawn logo. If it were a professional font the diagonal lines would have been a bit thinner and the 'arm pits' on M and A deeper, etc.
looks like [Plume Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20130526034743/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/daltonmaag/plume/) with a crossbar mod/removal.
